snippet: An international meeting on Libya that was held in Paris focused on border control, weapon-smuggling and challenges posed by regional militias that have not disarmed.
abstract: Libya’s weak government is struggling to control its borders, stop weapons smuggling and manage regional militias that have refused to disarm.
lead_paragraph: An international meeting on Libya that was held in Paris focused on border control, weapon-smuggling and challenges posed by regional militias that have not disarmed.

headline.seo: 2 Years After Revolt, Libya Faces Host of Problems
headline.main: Two Years After Revolt, Libya Faces a Host of Problems
headline.print_headline: Two Years After Revolt, Libya Faces a Host of Problems
